title: Turn any car into a tech-savvy ride this holiday season
content:
Macworld

Holiday road trips are better when you’ve got all your apps right at your fingertips — safely, of course. This 10” wireless car display brings Apple CarPlay and Android Auto to almost any vehicle, making it an ideal gift for tech-savvy drivers or those stuck with older car setups, on sale for $99.97 at 50% off (reg. $199) through December 8.

Designed to keep things hands-free, this display syncs with your phone via Wi-Fi or Bluetooth to give you access to navigation, music, calls, and more without fumbling for your device. Whether it’s Google Maps or your holiday playlist, the crisp 10” screen ensures everything is easy to see and control. No built-in infotainment system? No problem — this works seamlessly with almost any car.

It’s the ultimate holiday gift to keep drivers connected, safe, and ready for the next adventure.

Perfect for the friend who’s always on the road or that family member who loves a tech upgrade, this 10″ Touchscreen Wireless Car Display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Support for $99.97 turns any ride into a smart one.
